message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to give you a little more, but I'm not going to give you everything. Let's find a compromise.
You're getting closer, but I think I can do better.
Alright, Bob, you're pushing it, but I'm willing to meet you halfway this time. Let's call it a day.
